Header: Purchasing paddy of Yala Season begins from the Ampara District
Content: Paddy Marketing Board commenced purchasing of paddy of Yala Season from the Ampara District. Purchasing of a kilogram of Nadu Paddy for 38 rupees and a kilogram of Samba Paddy for 41 rupees was commenced at Uhana Weranketagoda Paddy Storage Complex. The Paddy Marketing Board has made arrangements to purchase paddy from the time of harvesting to avoid the congestion when purchasing paddy. The government has allocated 975 million rupees to purchase 25 metric tons of paddy from the Ampara District.
